sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: That's after a Russian state-run Gazprom halved the amount of natural gas flowing through a major pipeline from Russia to Europe, capping it at 20% of capacity.

sentences.sentence: In the Austrian Alps, two hotels with links to Russian oligarchs have been sold at a forced auction.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The Maximilian Hotel will go to the Otzel Consortium for 6 million euros, while the Terrala Hof was bought out by the Association of Hoteliers of the ski resort Zerfass for 3.8 million euros. In 2019, following his investigation, politician Alexei Navalny said a secret business was being run in Austria and accused Andrei Matelsky, the former head of Putin's United Russia faction in the Moscow city Duma, of acquiring four hotels with dubious funds. He suggested that these were then registered in the name of his mother, his son and of an old friend, Pyotr Ivanovsky, United Russia member and former Moscow deputy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: According to Navalny, Motelsky withdrew more than 50 million euros from the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Since 2020, the authorities have been threatening to put the properties up for auction due to the termination of loan payments.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
